meanings.definition: relating to or involved in the process of producing something
meanings.sent1: The productional team worked tirelessly to create the new movie.
meanings.sent2: The factory's productional line was efficient and effective.
meanings.sent3: The productional crew had a race to see who could finish their tasks first.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a productional powerhouse, constantly generating new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The productional process was like a well-oiled machine, smoothly churning out products.

meanings.definition: capable of producing or creating something
meanings.sent1: The artist's productional skills were evident in every painting.
meanings.sent2: The fertile soil was highly productional, yielding abundant crops.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat seemed to have a productional ability to produce endless scarves.
meanings.sent4: His imagination was a productional engine, constantly generating new stories.
meanings.sent5: The factory's machinery was impressively productional, able to create intricate parts with precision.

meanings.definition: pertaining to the production of goods or services
meanings.sent1: The company's productional department was responsible for manufacturing the products.
meanings.sent2: The productional costs of the project were carefully calculated.
meanings.sent3: The productional staff celebrated the successful launch of their new service.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to the productional aspect of the business was commendable.
meanings.sent5: The productional efficiency of the factory was crucial for meeting customer demands.
